summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate and resolve the issues causing this failure to ensure a smooth user experience.
insights: The blog page has the best performance, with the lowest load time and TTFB. This could serve as a benchmark for optimizing other pages.
The homepage load time is reasonable, but there is room for improvement in TTFB and FCP.
The pricing page has a high TTFB, which might affect user experience and conversion rates. Addressing this issue should be a priority.
